TopicTitle: Always active "engines" and separate throttle parts

Articles.Content: I need to make an engine which has fuel input controlled by an external throttle part. Any ideas on how this can be done?
Try taking a look at Throttle Controlled Avionics' code. It controls engine throttles by adjusting their thrust limiters.
You are going to need a module that listens for the throttle and creates thrust according to that, and a module that gives the maximum thrust of the engine.
